alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Worcester, northwestern Middlesex and east central Franklin Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Athol, or near Orange, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Fitchburg, Orange, Gardner, Athol, Pepperell, Groton, Winchendon, Lunenburg, Townsend, Templeton, Westminster, Shirley, Ashburnham, Barre, Hubbardston, Ashby, Erving, Phillipston, Royalston and Petersham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County
